TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListItem extends System.Windows.Documents.TextElement

summary.span: 在已排序或未排序的 中代表特殊內容項目的非固定格式內容項目。

span.span: A flow content element that represents a particular content item in an ordered or unordered .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會強制執行強式的內容模型的子內容。 enforces a strong content model for child content. 請參閱[TextElement 內容模型概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md)如需詳細資訊內容模型。See [TextElement Content Model Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md) for more information about the content model. 元素必須包含項目。 elements must be contained by a element. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何定義使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。The following example shows how to define a using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]. [!code-xaml[ListSnippets#_ListXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_listxaml)] 下列範例示範如何建立及填入以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to create and populate a programmatically. [!code-csharp[ListSnippets#_List_Props](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_list_props)] [!code-vb[ListSnippets#_List_Props](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_list_props)] 下圖顯示此範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面：已排序的清單](~/add/media/ordered-list.png "螢幕擷取畫面：已排序的清單")![Screenshot: Ordered list](~/add/media/ordered-list.png "Screenshot: Ordered list") 下列範例示範如何定義巢狀（在清單中列出） 使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。The following example shows how to define a nested (lists within lists) using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]. [!code-xaml[ListSnippets#_NestedListXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_nestedlistxaml)] 下圖顯示此範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![巢狀清單](~/add/media/flow-nested-list-example.png "巢狀清單")![Nested list](~/add/media/flow-nested-list-example.png "Nested list")

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需顯示可用的預先定義筆刷色彩的樣本的表格，請參閱。For a table of swatches that show the available predefined brush colors, see . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定的屬性項目 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Thickness BorderThickness { System::Windows::Thickness get(); void set(System::Windows::Thickness value); };
member this.BorderThickness : System.Windows.Thickness with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定項目的框線粗細。

span.span: Gets or sets the border thickness for the element.

value.span: 結構，指定要套用的框線數量 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)。

span.span: A structure that specifies the amount of border to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 預設值是粗細一致的零 (0.0)。

span.span: The default is a uniform thickness of zero (0.0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 單一的字串表示法一致地套用所有的四個粗細維度值。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，值`"10"`相當於針對`"10,10,10,10"`。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 不合格的值被以與裝置無關的像素。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字串不需要明確包含小數位數。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四個已排序的字串表示法值對應至獨立的粗細維度 left，top，以滑鼠右鍵，並 bottom，依此順序。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 四個值必須是以逗號分隔的;不允許有空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 比方說，「 5,10,15,20"會導致 5 像素框線的左邊的內容、 內容上方的框線的 10 個像素、 15 像素框線右邊的內容和 20 個像素框線下方的內容。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of border to the left of content, 10 pixels of border above content, 15 pixels of border to the right of content, and 20 pixels of border below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* 所描述的值*uniformThickness*後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 比方說，`"1in"`提供統一的框線，往所有方向的 1 英吋。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform border of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* 所描述的值*independentThickness*，以每個獨立的值，後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如，`"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 單位規範可能會混合，或從一個或多個值中省略。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定的屬性項目 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_BordersXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_bordersxaml)] 下圖顯示此範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面：藍色，1/4 英吋框線圍繞在 Block 周圍](~/add/media/block-borders.png "螢幕擷取畫面：圍繞在 Block 周圍的藍色，1/4 英吋框線")![Screenshot: Blue, 1/4inch border around Block](~/add/media/block-borders.png "Screenshot: Blue, 1/4inch border around Block") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_Borders](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_borders)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_Borders](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_borders)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::FlowDirection FlowDirection { System::Windows::FlowDirection get(); void set(System::Windows::FlowDirection value); };
member this.FlowDirection : System.Windows.FlowDirection with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 項目中內容的相對流向。

span.span: Gets or sets the relative direction for flow of content within a element.

value.span: 其中一個 值，這個值會指定相對流向。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the relative flow direction.

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得這個屬性會傳回目前有效的流向。Getting this property returns the currently effective flow direction. 設定此屬性會導致 項目的內容依指示的方向重新流動。Setting this property causes the contents of the element to re-flow in the indicated direction. 文字方向的內容通常會對應到所表示之語言的固有流向。The flow direction of content typically corresponds to the innate flow direction of the language being represented. 希伯來文和阿拉伯文會自然方向由右至左的語言的範例。Hebrew and Arabic are examples of languages that naturally flow from right to left. 英文、 德文和俄文會自然流程從左到右的語言的範例。English, German, and Russian are examples of languages that naturally flow from left to right. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性的值不會自動變更為符合作業系統所使用的語言。The value of this property is not automatically changed to match the language used by the operating system. 如果您要使用不同的值，預設值是比，您必須指定它自己。If you need to use a different value than the default of , you must specify it yourself. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|、 , | ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定的屬性項目 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirectionXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_flowdirectionxaml)] 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_flowdirection)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_flowdirection)]

Public Shared ReadOnly FlowDirectionProperty As DependencyProperty

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double LineHeight { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.LineHeight : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定每行內容的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of each line of content.

value.span: 其值範圍從 0.0034 到 160000 的每行高度 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)。

span.span: The height of each line in device independent pixels with a value range of 0.0034 to 160000.

value.span: 值為(相當於屬性值"自動」) 會使行高由目前字型特性自動決定。

span.span: A value of (equivalent to an attribute value of "Auto") causes the line height to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics.

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變更值不會變更相關聯的文字的高度; 相反地，它會變更行包含文字的高度。Changing the value does not change the height of the associated text; rather, it changes the height of the line that contains the text. 除了這個屬性，版面配置中的總行受到其屬性。In addition to this property, the layout of lines in a is affected by its property. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 字串表示法值在範圍`0.0034`至`160000`。String representation of a value in the range `0.0034` to `160000`. 不合格的值被以與裝置無關的像素。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字串不需要明確包含小數位數。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* A*雙*值，上面所述 (但不支援`Auto`) 後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 是公釐。1cm==(96/2.54) 像素`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px 自動Auto 會使行高由目前字型特性自動決定。Causes the line height to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics. 相當於屬性值。Equivalent to a property value of . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性的項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_LineHeightXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_lineheightxaml)] 下圖顯示先前範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how the previous example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面：FlowDocument LineHeight](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheight.png "螢幕擷取畫面：FlowDocument LineHeight")![Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheight.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight") 下圖顯示相同的範例使用的預設設定的轉譯方式 = 。The following figure shows how the same example renders with the default setting of =. ![螢幕擷取畫面：FlowDocument lineheight](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheightdefault.png "螢幕擷取畫面：FlowDocument lineheight 為預設值")![Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight default](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheightdefault.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight default") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_LineHeight](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_lineheight)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_LineHeight](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_lineheight)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Thickness Margin { System::Windows::Thickness get(); void set(System::Windows::Thickness value); };
member this.Margin : System.Windows.Thickness with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定項目的邊界粗細。

span.span: Gets or sets the margin thickness for the element.

value.span: 結構，指定要套用的邊界數量 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)。

span.span: A structure that specifies the amount of margin to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 預設值是粗細一致的零 (0.0)。

span.span: The default is a uniform thickness of zero (0.0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是落在外部項目的內容區域，此項目的內容區域的邊緣與父項目邊緣之間的緩衝區空間。 is buffer space that falls outside an element's content area, between the edges of the element's content area and the edges of the parent element. 與相反，也就是落在項目的內容區域中，元素的內容與內部項目的邊緣之間的緩衝區空間。Contrast with , which is buffer space that falls inside an element's content area, between the element's content and the inner edge of the element. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 單一的字串表示法一致地套用所有的四個粗細維度值。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，值`"10"`相當於針對`"10,10,10,10"`。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 不合格的值被以與裝置無關的像素。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字串不需要明確包含小數位數。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四個已排序的字串表示法值對應至獨立的粗細維度 left，top，以滑鼠右鍵，並 bottom，依此順序。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 四個值必須是以逗號分隔的;不允許有空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 比方說，「 5,10,15,20"會導致 5 像素邊界的內容及內容上方邊界的 10 個像素、 15 像素的邊界，右邊的內容，內容下方邊界 20 個像素的左邊。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of margin to the left of content, 10 pixels of margin above content, 15 pixels of margin to the right of content, and 20 pixels of margin below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* 所描述的值*uniformThickness*後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 比方說，`"1in"`提供統一的邊界，往所有方向的 1 英吋。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform margin of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* 所描述的值*independentThickness*，以每個獨立的值，後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如，`"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 單位規範可能會混合，或從一個或多個值中省略。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定的屬性項目 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPaddingXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_marginpaddingxaml)] 下圖顯示此範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how this example renders. 如需圖例可誇張的粗細和色彩。Exaggerated thicknesses and colors are used for illustration. ![螢幕擷取畫面：與邊框距離及邊界的段落](~/add/media/block-marginpadding.png "螢幕擷取畫面：與邊框距離及邊界的段落")![Screenshot: Paragraphs with padding and margins](~/add/media/block-marginpadding.png "Screenshot: Paragraphs with padding and margins") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPadding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_marginpadding)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPadding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_marginpadding)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Thickness Padding { System::Windows::Thickness get(); void set(System::Windows::Thickness value); };
member this.Padding : System.Windows.Thickness with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定項目的填補框線粗細。

span.span: Gets or sets the padding thickness for the element.

value.span: 指定套用於與裝置無關的像素計算之填補數量的 結構。

span.span: A structure that specifies the amount of padding to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 預設值是粗細一致的零 (0.0)。

span.span: The default is a uniform thickness of zero (0.0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是落在項目的內容區域中，元素的內容與內部項目的邊緣之間的緩衝區空間。 is buffer space that falls inside an element's content area, between the element's content and the inner edge of the element. 與相反，也就是落在外部項目的內容區域，此項目的內容區域的邊緣與父項目邊緣之間的緩衝區空間。Contrast with , which is buffer space that falls outside an element's content area, between the edges of the element's content area and the edges of the parent element. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 單一的字串表示法一致地套用所有的四個粗細維度值。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，值`"10"`相當於針對`"10,10,10,10"`。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 不合格的值被以與裝置無關的像素。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字串不需要明確包含小數位數。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四個已排序的字串表示法值對應至獨立的粗細維度 left，top，以滑鼠右鍵，並 bottom，依此順序。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 四個值必須是以逗號分隔的;不允許有空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 比方說，「 5,10,15,20"會導致 5 像素的邊框距離左邊的內容、 內容上方填補的 10 個像素、 15 像素的邊框間距右邊的內容和 20 個像素內容下方的填補。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of padding to the left of content, 10 pixels of padding above content, 15 pixels of padding to the right of content, and 20 pixels of padding below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* 所描述的值*uniformThickness*後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 比方說，`"1in"`提供統一的填補，往所有方向的 1 英吋。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform padding of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* 所描述的值*independentThickness*，以每個獨立的值，後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如，`"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 單位規範可能會混合，或從一個或多個值中省略。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定的屬性項目 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). summary.span: 取得 ，其中包含的 項目是目前 項目的同層級。

span.span: Gets a that contains the elements that are siblings of the current element.

value.span: 包含由目前 項目父項目所裝載的所有子 項目之 ，若目前 項目沒有父代，則為 。

span.span: A that contains the child elements that are directly hosted by the parent of the current element, or if the current element has no parent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性傳回包含透過它存取集合，; 也就是擁有此屬性的項目會被視為它自己的同層級的目的產生同層級項目集合的項目。The returned by this property includes the element through which the collection is accessed; that is, the element that owns this property is considered to be its own sibling for the purposes of generating the collection of siblings.
